CHAT.comment: Mar 9 1993 Colleen Dear Nana I miss you I will come out next week. I hope you like your couch. how is Ericka and cris tell them I miss them

context notes say Mot and Chi sit next to each other on the couch. Chi writes quickly but stops and sits back after finishing each line. Initially , Chi thought EXP wanted her to write a letter of the alphabet. EXP and Mot clear up the confusion. Chi decides to write to her grandmother. Chi asks Mot for help with some spelling. Mot also points out corrections as Chi writes. Mot has Chi put the date. Chi's hand+writing is quite neat.

u.a: points to the spot on the paper to write the date
Chi is writing and sounding out letters
Chi is asking for help from Mot ?
points to end of sentence on page
Chi erases small e and puts a capital e
MOT corrects how Chi makes the k . Chi erases original and corrects it
points to spot on page after tell
lots_of noise in the background of trucks going by
